Download specific data related to the key ECB interest rates.

The main refinancing operations (MRO) rate is one of the three key interest rates the ECB sets regularly as part of its work to keep prices stable in the euro area. The MRO rate is the interest rate banks pay when they borrow money from the ECB for one week.
